verbose_text: In a rat model of hippocampal neurodegeneration, administration of 17-beta-estradiol (E2) in ovariectomized animals induced upregulation of genes involved in neuroprotection and synaptogenesis, as well as GAD67, PV, and genes that regulate PV synthesis : Pgcalpha-1 and Sirtuin 1.
evidence: E2) in ovariectomized animals induced upregulation of genes involved in neuroprotection and synaptogenesis, as well as GAD67, PV
